original_title: With God on Our Side: George W. Bush and the Rise of the Religious Right in America
overview: With God on Our Sideâ€¦ is an excessive title about Christian church fundamentalism and how, like the Taliban, religious groups feel a God given right to institute a society of specific religious beliefs that not everyone shares.
